sqlMap.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_ADDR, MEM_PHOTO FROM MYMEMBER
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MYMEMBER(MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_ADDR, MEM_PHOTO) VALUES (#mem_id#, #mem_pass#, #mem_name#, #mem_tel#, #mem_addr#, #mem_photo#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MYMEMBER SET MEM_NAME=#mem_name#, MEM_PASS=#mem_pass#, MEM_TEL=#mem_tel#, MEM_ADDR=#mem_addr#, MEM_PHOTO=#mem_photo# WHERE MEM_ID=#mem_id#
